title: Virgin Islands Coral Reef National Monument: Donate
body: Donate       You can make a gift to benefit the park either directly, or through our primary non profit organization. If you choose to make a donation directly to the park, you may mail it to:  Superintendent Virgin Islands National Park 1300 Cruz Bay Creek St. John, U.S. Virgin Islands 00830  The entire gift will be used for the purpose you identify. Your check will be deposited in a government account and the full amount will be spent as you intended. Government accounts are non-interest bearing and cannot generate interest between the time it is deposited and the time it is spent. For security and other reasons, you cannot make on line contributions directly to the park or National Park Service, however, you can stop in or mail a check to the parkâ€™s visitor center at the above address to donate.  You can make on line gifts through our primary park partner, Friends of Virgin Islands National Park on their website. Donations can be directed to the general need of the park, or to a specific program or project (i.e. trail maintenance or education program).
